AGAVE requirementsÂ¶

To get started with AGAVE you must have the following installed:

  • MySQL 5.1+
  • Python 2.6+
  • virtualenv 1.4.7+

See Installing AGAVE in Debian/Ubuntu to know how to install it.

Some of the next requirements are optional or will be installed automatically following the process explained in Installing AGAVE in Debian/Ubuntu

  • Django 1.2+

  • bioreader (optional) to initialise database with Pubmed XML files.

    It can also be downloaded on sourceforge or as NLTK contributions

  • SPARQLWrapper 1.4.1+ for mesh_skos_broader module

  • R 2.12+ (optional) for agave_graph_analysis module
